name: awkwardly
content:
awkwardly adverb
(WITH EMBARRASSMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a worried or embarrassed way: He shifted awkwardly from one foot to the other.
in an embarrassing or worrying way, or a way that causes problems: The publication of the economic statistics was awkwardly timed for the government.
